posts.title: Hexo添加看板娘
posts.text: Hexo添加看板娘 安装插件 sudo npm install --save hexo-helper-live2d 下载模型 模型预览地址:https://huaji8.top/post/live2d-plugin-2.0/ sudo npm install live2d-widget-model-hijiki 在博客根目录配置文件_config.yml写入配置 12345678910111213141516live2d: enable: true scriptFrom: local pluginRootPath: live2dw/ pluginJsPath: lib/ pluginModelPath: assets/ tagMode: false debug: false model: use: live2d-widget-model-tororo display: position: right width: 150 height: 300 mobile: show: true 部署 清除缓存 hexo clean 生成静态文件 hexo g 部署到本地 hexo s 部署到仓库 hexo d

posts.title: Hexo更换主题
posts.text: Hexo更换主题 下载主题Pure git clone https://github.com/cofess/hexo-theme-pure.git themes/pure 修改配置文件_config.yml 1234# Extensions## Plugins: https://hexo.io/plugins/## Themes: https://hexo.io/themes/theme: pure 更新主题 123方法一cd themes/pure git pull 1234方法二sudo hexo cleansudo hexo gsudo hexo d 配置主题 pure主题配置地址:https://blog.cofess.com/2017/11/01/hexo-blog-theme-pure-usage-description.html 不同的主题配置方法不一样。请进入主题的仓库首页查询相关配置信息 安装插件 安装hexo-wordcountnpm install hexo-wordcount --save 安装hexo-generator-json-contentnpm install hexo-generator-json-content --save 安装hexo-generator-feednpm install hexo-generator-feed --save 安装hexo-generator-sitemapnpm install hexo-generator-sitemap --save 安装hexo-generator-baidu-sitemapnpm install hexo-generator-baidu-sitemap --save 注意：以上五个插件并不需要全部安装请按照需求个人需要安装插件 添加页面 添加标签页hexo new page tags 添加分类页hexo new page categories

posts.title: Hexo博客框架配置
posts.text: Hexo博客框架配置 安装nodejs sudo apt-get install nodejs 安装npm sudo apt-get install npm 安装hexo博客框架 sudo npm install -g hexo-cli 创建博客 初始化文件夹 sudo hexo init 修改配置文件_config.yml sudo chmod 777 _config.yml12345678910111213# Sitelanguage: zh-CNtimezone: Asia/Shanghai# URLurl: http://yoursite.comroot: /himing.io/ # Deploymentdeploy:type: 'git'repo: 'https://github.com/Himing4/himing.io.git'branch: master 安装部署工具 sudo npm install hexo-deployer-git --save 部署前准备 清除缓存 sudo hexo clean 生成静态文件 sudo hexo generate 部署 sudo hexo deploy

posts.title: Git开发环境
posts.text: Git开发环境Git配置 安装Git sudo apt install git 配置Git git config --global user.email "xxxxx@qq.com" git config --global user.name "gitName" 生成密钥 ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "xxxxxxx@qq.com" Github配置 复制id_rsa.pub 打开Github官网 点击头像，选择Setting SSH and GPG keys Add SSH keys

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
